items.title: Three Things We Saw in Notre Dame’s Win Over Navy
items.summary: Your Notre Dame Fighting Irish are now 7-2 and will continue to rise in the College Football Playoff rankings after a 49-10 win over Navy. items.title: GAME THREAD: #10 Notre Dame Fighting Irish VS Navy Midshipmen
items.summary: The United States Naval Academy is flying into the darkness of South Bend for a prime time game against the Notre Dame Fighting Irish. items.title: Notre Dame fans aren’t very confident about hosting a playoff game
items.summary: The initial college football playoff rankings came out this week, and the Notre Dame Fighting Irish were selected as the #10 team in the country by the CFP committee. items.title: STAFF PICKS: #10 Notre Dame Fighting Irish VS Navy Midshipmen
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish have slowly climbed back up the rankings, and are now ranked #10 in the country in the college football playoff rankings. following their bye week. items.title: WEATHER UPDATE: Notre Dame VS Navy
items.summary: It’s November in South Bend, so that means the weather for Notre Dame Football games can be a little tough on the senses.
